meanings.definition: The quality or state of being loud.
meanings.sent1: The loudness of the music at the concert was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the loudness of the thunderstorm from inside the house.
meanings.sent3: The loudness of my brother's snoring kept me up all night.
meanings.sent4: The loudness of the fireworks echoed through the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The loudness of the alarm clock jolted me awake in the morning.

meanings.sent1: The loudness of the explosion was deafening.
meanings.sent2: The loudness of the train passing by made it hard to hear.
meanings.sent3: The loudness of the cat's meow was surprisingly powerful.
meanings.sent4: The loudness of the applause filled the entire auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The loudness of the wind howling outside was unsettling.
